    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_115060</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Intermolecular forces and pressure in gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Intermolekulare Kräfte und Druck in den Gasen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces et pression intermoléculaires en gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças e pressão intermolecular nos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze e pressione intermolecolari in gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμοριακές δυνάμεις και πίεση στα αέρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas y presión intermoleculares en gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the forces acting on a molecule moving outwards of the main volume of a gas. The molecule experiences an attractive force from the surrounding molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attractive force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ideal gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">intermolecular force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">real gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Kräfte, die auf einem 
Molekül fungieren, das außerhalb vom Hauptdatenträger eines Gases 
bewegt. Das Molekül erfährt eine attraktive Kraft von den 
umgebenden Molekülen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les forces agissant sur
une molécule montant du volume principal d'un gaz. La molécule
éprouve une force attrayante des molécules environnantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as forças que agem em 
uma molécula que move-se para fora do volume principal de um gás. 
A molécula experimenta uma força atrativa das moléculas 
circunvizinhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le forze che si 
comportano su una molecola che si muove esternamente del volume 
principale di un gas. La molecola avverte una forza attraente 
dalle molecole circostanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις δυνάμεις ενεργώντας 
σε ένα μόριο που κινείται εξωτερικά της βασικής έντασης του 
ήχου του α αέριο. Το μόριο δοκιμάζει μια ελκυστική 
δύναμη από τα περιβάλλοντα μόρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las fuerzas que actúan 
en una molécula que se mueve hacia fuera del volumen principal de un 
gas. La molécula experimenta una fuerza atractiva de las 
moléculas circundantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">attraktive Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenstoß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ideales Gas</string>
          </keyword>
